sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A fourth volume containing one hundred and fifty sermons on several texts of Scripture in two parts : part the first containing LXXIV sermons : part the second containing LXXVI sermons : with an alphabetical table to the whole / by ... Thomas Manton ... Manton, Thomas, 1620-1677.
1 v. (various pagings)
Printed by J. D. and are to be sold by Jonathon Robinson ..., London : 1693.
Some pages are stained, print is faded, and there is show-through. Page 317 is stained. Pages 378, 383, 695, 796-97, 898, and 935 are misnumbered. Pages 488-95, 549-600, and 993-94 are missing in number onlyin filmed copy. Pages 300-31 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at the end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

1 v. (various pagings)
Printed by J. D. and are to be sold by Jonathon Robinson ..., London : 1693.
Some pages are stained, print is faded, and there is show-through. Page 317 is stained. Pages 378, 383, 695, 796-97, 898, and 935 are misnumbered. Pages 488-95, 549-600, and 993-94 are missing in number onlyin filmed copy. Pages 300-31 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at the end.
